content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad you like the apartment. I am sure you will find it very convenient and comfortable. Let's start with a price of 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I am willing to negotiate, but I want to get the best price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, the apartment is indeed very attractive. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Could you consider a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I could do 950 Euros per month. Remember, this apartment is newly built and in the city center. It is also close to all important facilities. I do not want to give it away for cheap.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer is quite reasonable. However, as a student, I am on a tight budget. Would you be willing to go lower, say 900 Euros?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I could do 800 Euros per month, but that is as low as I can go for a tenant as good as you. Remember, the apartment is in high demand, and I could easily find someone who is willing to pay more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 800 Euros is a very attractive price. I am impressed by your willingness to accommodate. I would like to proceed with the rental at that price. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
